[Bionic Alteration] Bionic Workshop can be access in refit menu via Additional Options (Top) if you have Lunalib enabled
[Bionic Alteration] In Bionic Workshop, selecting a limb will highlight which bionic is compatible
[Bionic Alteration] In Bionic Workshop Overview, clicking on the person in the person list will move to the Workshop UI
[Bionic Alteration] QoL/Suggestions/Complains/Bug reports are always welcome, keep it coming!
